title: Wind Turbine Aerodynamics
description: CFD simulation of a horizontal‑axis wind turbine to evaluate aerodynamic performance under varying wind conditions using OpenFOAM. Includes CAD model, mesh, and post‑processing results.
longDescription: Detailed pipeline with meshing, turbulence models (k‑ε and k‑ω), and validation against literature data.

title: Smart Grid Voltage Optimization
description: Reinforcement learning for reactive power control to reduce distribution losses and maintain voltage limits.
longDescription: Implements DQN and actor–critic controllers on IEEE 33‑bus feeder with OpenDSS co‑simulation.

title: Bridge Structural Health Monitoring
description: Data‑driven structural health monitoring of bridges using vibration sensors and finite element modelling. Provides raw sensor data and Jupyter notebooks for analysis.
longDescription: Ambient vibration testing, modal identification, FE model updating, damage localization.
